title: A Brief Guide to Cyber Security
headline: Learn how to prevent, detect and react to a cyber attack to protect data in this free online cyber security course.
description: Cyber security has gained more prominence as colossal breaches make headlines and threaten information across the globe. Almost all cases are due to human errors like clicking on an attachment and installing malware or revealing sensitive information to hackers. However, being aware of cyber attack tactics and techniques can dramatically reduce the chances of a data breach. This cyber security training course explains how to prevent such attacks.
courseDescription:
Being virtually connected at all times via computers, smartphones and other devices creates a wide range of opportunities for those who want to act unlawfully. This course focuses on increasing cyber security awareness using best practices for individuals and organizations of all sizes. You will learn how to prevent, detect and react to a cyber security attack or breach.

The course describes various cyber attacks and how to use the internet safely. Topics such as social engineering, malware, password management and secure internet usage are covered in detail to provide effective defense techniques without demanding too much suspicion, balancing trust with verification.

According to Reuters, end-user awareness and training can reduce cyber security-related risks for individuals and organizations by 45% to 70%. A staggering 66% of all system infections happen via human error, such as clicking on email attachments or links, opening USB sticks or downloading software from the internet. You can minimize such risk by being aware of cyber attack tactics. Why wait? Enroll now and learn to reduce your cyber security risk today!
